name: L'Éveil de Fantasia
description:
PITCH

Play as Fantasia, Princess of the Moon, locked up by her father in the royal prison. Make your way to the exit while avoiding the guards !

Based on Jacques OFFENBACH's " Le voyage dans la Lune ".

More informations : https://artfx.school/en/opera-and-video-game-travel-to-the-moon/

DETAILS

Developer: ArtFX Promo 2022
Release: December 2020
Platform: PC, MAC
Genre: Stealth
Languages: French
Subtitles : French, English, Italien, German, Spanish
Target: 8+

CONTROLS

Z: Move forward                             
S: Move Backward
Q: Move Left
D: Move Right 
E/LMB: Interact

METADATA

Input methods: Keyboard/Controller
Average sessions: 5-10 min
Multiplayer: No
Languages: French
Subtitles: English, Italian, German, Spanish
Adult content: No
Engine: Unreal Engine

ACCESSIBILITY

You can change the daltonism mode in the Options.
